Constructs new error condition.
@1@ Default constructor. Initializes the error condition with generic category and error value {{c|0}}.

@2@ Initializes the error condition with error value {{tt|val}} and error category {{tt|cat}}.

@3@ Initializes the error condition with enum {{tt|e}}. Effectively calls {{tt|make_error_condition}} that is only found by [[cpp/language/adl|argument-dependent lookup]] for {{tt|e}}. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_error_condition_enum&lt;ErrorConditionEnum&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@4,5@ Implicitly defined copy constructor and move constructor. Initializes the error condition with the contents of the {{tt|other}}.
